values: To listen is to pay attention to a sound that you can hear.
Lisa wanted to listen carefully to her friend.
时态:listened, listening, listens名 词:listener
时态:listened, listening, listens名 词:listener
vi.倾听,留心听,听信,（让对方注意）听着n.听，倾听
vi. 倾听(与介词to并用，方可置宾语)
vi. 倾听(与介词to并用，方可置宾语)
听, 听取, 倾听, 听录音 (verb.)
vi.听，留神听，听从，倾听，n.听，倾听
v.&n . 倾听；<衍生词> listener n . 收听者，听众
To listen is to pay attention to and hear what someone is saying.
To listen means to pay attention to someone or something that is speaking or making a sound.
vi. 听，倾听；听从，听信,n. 听，倾听
